title: Online Learning Environment Design and Learner Engagement Enhancement Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Practical experience in scientific fields and advanced expertise
context.additional_context: Science education for current practitioners, operated in smartphone-based limited technological environments with a focus on formative assessment

learning_goals: Learners can design and apply three or more strategies to promote interaction in online learning environments.
Learners can propose content development plans optimized for mobile device usage.
Learners can build a system that provides real-time feedback using formative assessment tools.
Learners can develop customized learning pathways reflecting the characteristics of small groups.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
